Heirloom Purple Carrots

Heirloom Purple Carrots

Fruits and Vegetables Category

Description

Our Heirloom Purple Carrots are not just a feast for the eyes but a bounty of health benefits, grown with love on local farms that practice sustainable agriculture. These unique carrots have a sweet, slightly peppery flavor that sets them apart from their orange counterparts. Originating from ancient varieties, they are cultivated to preserve their genetic diversity and nutritional value. By choosing these carrots, you support farming practices that prioritize soil health and biodiversity. Their deep purple hue, attributed to anthocyanins, provides antioxidants not commonly found in regular carrots. Perfect for roasting, juicing, or as a raw snack, Heirloom Purple Carrots bring a splash of color and a host of nutrients to your plate.

Specifications

  • Weight: 1 lb per bundle
  • Size: Approximately 6-8 inches in length
  • Packaging: Biodegradable string and paper label
  • Nutritional Information: High in vitamin A, antioxidants, and fiber

Benefits

  • Nutritional Superiority

    Packed with vitamins and antioxidants for health.

  • Sustainable Choice

    Supports eco-friendly farming practices.

  • Unique Flavor

    Offers a distinct, gourmet taste for culinary exploration.
